main event: A civilian in Pittsburgh, PA reported seeing a single unidentified flying object hovering for 45 minutes in April 1965.
interesting points: The witness did not provide any photographs of the UFO.
The Air Force's preliminary investigation suggested the sighting was likely a weather phenomenon, such as a meteor or other astronomical occurrence.
The Air Force assured the witness that the matter would be held in confidence and no public release of the information would be made.
The Air Force requested the witness fill out a PIC-FTD form 36 to provide more information for further evaluation.
The Air Force indicated they have on file more than 9,200 observations of unidentified flying objects.
